panels.description: The total number of disconnected connections.

targets.expr: sum(pg_client_disconnects_total{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Disconnected Connections

panels.description: The total number of disconnected connections.

targets.expr: sum(rate(pg_client_disconnects_total{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Disconnected Connections Rate

panels.description: The total number of connection errors with a database.

targets.expr: sum(pg_client_errors_total{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Connection Errors

panels.description: The total number of connection errors with a database.

targets.expr: sum(rate(pg_client_errors_total{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Connection Errors

panels.description: The number of connections that are currently in use.

targets.expr: sum(irate(pg_pool_active_connections{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Current size of the connection pool, including idle and and in-use members.

targets.expr: sum(pg_pool_size{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Connection Pool Usage

panels.description: Current size of the connection pool, including idle and and in-use members.

targets.expr: sum(pg_pool_size{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database) / sum(pg_pool_max{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Connection Pool Utilization

panels.description: The total number of waiting connections.

targets.expr: sum(pg_pool_waiting_connections{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Waiting Connections

panels.description: The total number of idle connections.

targets.expr: sum(pg_pool_idle_connections{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Idle Connections

panels.description: The maximum size of the connection pool.

targets.expr: sum(pg_pool_max{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Connection Pool Max

panels.description: The total number of removed connections.

targets.expr: sum(rate(pg_pool_connections_removed_total{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Removed Connections Rate

panels.description: The total number of removed connections.

targets.expr: sum(pg_pool_connections_removed_total{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Removed Connections

panels.description: The total number of connection errors with a database.

targets.expr: sum(pg_pool_errors_total{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Connection Errors

panels.description: The total number of connection errors with a database.

targets.expr: sum(rate(pg_pool_errors_total{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database)

panels.title: Connection Errors Rate

targets.expr: sum(rate(pg_command_duration_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", command=~"$command"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, command) / sum(rate(pg_command_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", command=~"$command"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, command)
sum(rate(pg_command_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", command=~"$command"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, command)
sum(rate(pg_command_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", command=~"$command", status="ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, command)
sum(pg_command_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", command=~"$command"}) by (instance, host, database, command)
sum(pg_command_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", command=~"$command", status="ERROR"}) by (instance, host, database, command)

sum(rate(pg_task_duration_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", task=~"$task"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, task) / sum(rate(pg_task_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", task=~"$task"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, task)
sum(rate(pg_task_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", task=~"$task"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, task)
sum(pg_task_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", task=~"$task"}) by (instance, host, database, task)

sum(rate(pg_transaction_duration_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", transaction=~"$transaction"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, transaction) / sum(rate(pg_transaction_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", transaction=~"$transaction"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, transaction)
sum(rate(pg_transaction_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", transaction=~"$transaction"}[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, host, database, transaction)
sum(pg_transaction_duration_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", host=~"$host", database=~"$database", transaction=~"$transaction"}) by (instance, host, database, transaction)
